item.title: Work Like It’s Your Money
item.description: https://medium.com/i-m-h-o/f6413278c0f5 The first thing I learned when I got to college was that I needed to start criticizing things, and quickly. My tendency to smile marked me a… Points 1 and 3 totally apply to me for my first startup internship. Note: This is an archived post from my unmaintained Tumblr blog https://k4rtik.tumblr.com
